mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPLY(ID,POST_ID, MEMBER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, GROUP_ID, REPLY_DEPTH) VALUES (SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{postId}, #{memberId}, #{replyContent},#{groupId}, #{replyDepth})
mapper.select: SELECT RE.ID, RE.MEMBER_ID,RE.POST_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, REPLY_CONTENT, RE.CREATED_DATE, RE.GROUP_ID FROM TBL_REPLY RE JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON RE.MEMBER_ID = M.ID ORDER BY RE.ID DESC
